text: Indragarh Sumerganj Mandi railway station is a railway station in Bundi district, Rajasthan. Its code is IDG. It serves Indragarh and Sumerganj Mandi. The station consists of 2 platforms. Passenger, Express, and Superfast trains halt here. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Bundi district Category:Kota railway division
title: Indragarh Sumerganj Mandi railway station
